name: Chasechama
description:
“The time for sleep has come Haachama!” 

In Chasechama you take control of Akai Haato...you degenerate! Seize Haachama’s sources of power and rescue the members of HoloEN from being eaten to subdue this usurper once and for all, but be warned, Haachama won't go down without a fight and the closer you get to defeating her the more desperate she'll become...

Controls: 

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Control Camera 

Esc/P - Pause

Entry for the Haachama horror contest 2/28/2021

https://twitter.com/akaihaato/status/1362759782659026949
